metadata.name: Facing the sun.
metadata.description:
"Facing the sun" is the first piece of a series called "NEON". This series is the essence, the achievement of what I've done for the last 10 years in digital art. Blending nature with bodies and light, playing with complementary colors and mood. This series is an hommage to Visual Poetry. 

1:1
Loop of 6 seconds
MP4 - 2580 × 3108px
